TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national of NORP origin , who lives in GPE ( GPE ) . He is represented before the ORG by Mr H. ORG , a lawyer practising in GPE ( GPE ) .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the applicant , may be summarised as follows .

On DATE ORG ( PERSON ) instituted preliminary investigation proceedings against the applicant and CARDINAL other suspects on suspicion of large - scale fraud and breach of trust in the context of investments in a real estate fund . They were suspected of having sold so called “ partial house ownership certificates ” to CARDINAL investors with the assurance that their value was secured by real property , but in fact they had sold the real property in DATE and misappropriated the proceeds of the sale .

As of DATE the investigating judge was relieved of all other business and CARDINAL junior judges completing their training period ( Richteramtsanwärter ) were assigned to assist him . In DATE CARDINAL of them took over as the new investigating judge .

During the preliminary investigations , which concerned a network of CARDINAL firms , CARDINAL bank accounts were examined and CARDINAL volumes of documents were seized and studied . A special computer programme was designed in order to cope with the large volume of data . Most of the time was consumed by the preparation of an expert opinion , whereby the team of accounting experts first had to clear the balance sheets of the companies , most of which were intertwined . A change in the team of experts became necessary in DATE due to the potential bias of some of its members . The team was restructured again in DATE . In DATE the experts delivered their opinion .
In DATE the applicant , who had his place of residence in GPE since DATE , obtained NORP citizenship .
In DATE the NORP authorities issued an international arrest warrant against the applicant . It appears that this warrant is still valid .
In DATE the NORP authorities requested the NORP authorities to take over the criminal proceedings against the applicant .
In DATE ORG opened criminal proceedings against the applicant .
On DATE ORG sent a letter to the applicant and informed that he had discontinued the criminal proceedings against him .

On DATE , even before the Investigating Judge formally closed the preliminary investigations , ORG ) preferred a bill of indictment ( PERSON ) of CARDINAL pages against the applicant and CARDINAL of his co - accused . However , since the applicant had no residence in GPE , the indictment could not be served on him .
On DATE ORG in GPE ( GPE ) refused to open criminal proceedings against the applicant as the prosecution had become time - barred ( PERSON ) in GPE .

Meanwhile , the co - accused had been convicted by the NORP courts and had been sentenced to prison sentences from DATE . However , the proceedings against the applicant are still pending due to the impossibility of serving the bill of indictment on the applicant .
